subject: Equipment Checkout Request
body:
You have been identified as eligible to check out a new company laptop. To maintain security and compliance, follow these steps: 

1) Verify approvals: ensure your manager has approved the equipment checkout request. 
2) Complete required training: complete the company IT equipment usage training listed on the training portal. 
3) Submit a checkout request: use the equipment checkout portal and include business justification and intended usage. 
4) Equipment pickup: the laptop and accessories will be available for pickup at the IT Service Desk. You will need to sign for the equipment and review the acceptable use policy. 
5) Return & renewal: the equipment must be returned before the checkout period expires. If you need an extension, submit a request with justification before the due date. 
6) Multi-factor authentication: ensure MFA is enabled on your account before the equipment can be checked out. 
7) Questions or issues: contact the IT Service Desk.

Reminder: do not share equipment passwords or access details in unencrypted messages.

Several high-risk indicators have been identified:

2) Sensitive payment card and personal identifiers being recorded in unsecured documents
3) Bypassing of dual approval controls and unauthorized payments
4) Lack of proper audit trail and reconciliation

This is a serious breach of our security and compliance protocols. Until a full investigation is completed, no new supplier payments can be processed. All suspicious activity must be escalated to Vendor Management, Finance Compliance, and the Fraud Response team immediately.

We will be implementing additional controls and monitoring to prevent future incidents. Thank you for your cooperation during this critical review.
